title: Implement progressive bird speed increase

requirements.text: Implement progressive speed increase mechanism where the bird's vertical velocity increases gradually as gameplay time progresses, making the game harder over time

quotes: The speed of bird step by step faster

acceptanceCriteria: Bird vertical velocity increases at regular intervals during active gameplay
Speed increase is noticeable but not jarring to gameplay experience
Speed resets to initial value when game restarts after collision

requirements.text: Add visual feedback to indicate speed level changes, such as a speed multiplier indicator or subtle UI notification when speed increases
acceptanceCriteria: Player can see current speed level or multiplier
Visual feedback appears when speed tier changes
Indicator does not obstruct core gameplay view

constraints: Do not change the backend implementation
Maintain existing Flappy Bird core mechanics (jumping, pipes, collision detection)
Preserve game playability - speed increases should be challenging but fair
